name: Historia' O Vernia
description:
A throwback to the more classical style of JRPG's, except the world is not here to hold your hand, you aren't some almighty hero on a quest to save the world, with the powers of a god. What you are is a ragtag group of outcasts with a mission. A simple mission, help a young woman find her sister. Who knows, maybe meet some more people along the way? Nothing could possibly go wrong for such a simple mission... Only one way to find out!

- Over 20 hours of content!
- 10 playable unique characters!
- Hidden story about the world!
- Advanced turn-based combat where everyone should get involved!
- Side quests everywhere!
- Customizable UI!


IN DEVELOPMENT!
Feedback is always welcome!

UPDATED: 20/01/22
